DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct research study understand cell responsible fight infection ( immune cell ) affect hormonal contraceptive use . The investigator hypothesize progestin-containing hormonal contraceptive ( i.e. , Depo-Provera ) inhibit host response infection . To test hypothesis , investigator collect blood genital tract sample woman initiation hormonal contraceptive ( either birth control pill , Depo-Provera , Mirena ) .
DOC.brief_title: Modulation Mucosal Systemic Immunity Hormonal Contraceptives
